   Hello All Gladiator Members Again I have Returned! Tis I The 
Legendary Light (Formerly Known as Light4700) Well, I have been 
working over the past year and i still hear things abaout my scenario 
levels for gladiator.  Well, I can tell you that i Still have them 
and i'm putting it on my web page real soon for download, of course i 
will still encode the file with the Regestered gladiator password in 
case it falls into the wrong hands.  Nice talking to you all again.


                                              Ricky

P.S. If you can't wait for me to post the levels on my web page, Give 
me an EMail at TheLegendaryLight@... and i will see what 
i can do about it. The Lvs range from 46-100 possibly and it 
increases all the time, have fun and i feel sorry about tom and his 
funds problem, maybe we should donate money to him to get the 
Gladiator-BF game ready
